name: cypress-example-reporters
description: Example showing multiple test reports merged into a single Mochawesome report

scripts.cypress:run headless: npx cypress run --headless --browser chrome --headless  --env allure=true --reporter mocha-allure-reporter
scripts.cypress:run: npx cypress run --browser chrome --headed --env allure=true --reporter mocha-allure-reporter
scripts.cy:parallel electron h: npx cypress-parallel --browser electron -s cypress:run --headless -t 3 -d 'tests/spec/**/**.js' --weightsJson 'tests/parallel-weights.json' --reporter mochawesome -b electron  --headless
scripts.cy:parallel electron: npx cypress-parallel --browser electron -s cypress:run -t 3 -d 'tests/spec/**/**.js' --weightsJson 'tests/parallel-weights.json' --reporter mochawesome -b electron --headed
scripts.cy:parallel chrome h: npx cypress-parallel --browser chrome  --headless -s cypress:run  -d 'tests/spec/**/**.js' --weightsJson 'tests/parallel-weights.json' --env allure=true --reporter mocha-allure-reporte
scripts.cy:parallel chrome: npx cypress-parallel --browser chrome -s cypress:run -t 3 -d 'tests/spec/**/**.js' --weightsJson 'tests/parallel-weights.json' --env allure=true --reporter mocha-allure-reporte --headed
scripts.delete:reports: rm -rf mochawesome-report results runner-results cypress/results cypress/videos cypress/screenshots/ allure-results || true
scripts.test:mochawesome: npm test && npm run merge:reports && npm run generate:report
